Integration Error: You must call startMatch at the beginning of the match. Please view the documentation at https://cdn.skillz.com/doc/developer/
Would you like us to notify you when the
Earn more ticketz just for playing the games you already love!

Ticketz is your loyalty program at Skillz that rewards you just for playing! Win or lose, you earn Ticketz for every match you complete. Save up your Ticketz and trade them in for awesome prizes like Skillz Bonus Cash, Gift Cards, a Jet-Ski or even a Porsche Boxster! Multipliers help you rack up Ticketz even faster, multiplying the number of Ticketz that you receive for each match. For example, if your multiplier is 2x, you will receive double the listed number of Ticketz for each match. If it is 3x, you receive triple the Ticketz for each match. Your multiplier each month is determined by the number of Ticketz you collected the previous month. For example, if you collect enough Ticketz during May to reach a multiplier of 6x, you will receive 6x the normal number of Ticketz for all matches played in the remainder of May and for all of June. Best of all, the higher the multiplier, the easier it is to get to the next tier! Game on! For more information: visit skillz.com/faq Apple is not a sponsor or involved with Skillz or the Ticketz loyalty program.
THE MORE YOU PLAY,\nTHE MORE YOU EARN!
No matter the game or the result, everyone wins Ticketz!
Save Em Up! Trade Em In!
The more Ticketz you earn, the faster they build up! Go get em!
